postData.caption:
https://peerlist.io/meetpatel/project/sniffhunt-scraper


Thank you for all the support. Never thought I would get this good a response. My mission is to make the best URL to Markdown tool for free and the best alternative, which outperforms even paid solutions and YC-backed startups.


SniffHunt just started getting started; currently, there is no web UI or custom Docker-based solution for the normal user. It has only CLI and MCP support. Soon, launching a beautiful UI & Docker-based solution for ease of use for day-to-day use for normal users as well!

metaData.title: Sniffhunt Scraper
metaData.tagline: Outperforms FireCrawl, Jina Reader, and other paid solutions
